title: [Sylvarraend, Town Commons]
description: Situated to one side of the square rests the local tavern, from which sounds of talk and merriment drift at irregular intervals.  A lantern swings from a nearby post, illuminating the silver-framed sign swinging from the awning above the front door.

Situated to one side of the square rests the local tavern, from which sounds of talk and merriment drift at irregular intervals.  To one side of the stone structure is a metal grill, apparently used for the braising of the tavernkeep's edible offerings.  A silver-framed sign swings from the awning above the front door.
